meanings.sent1: The explorers colonizes the new land, building homes and farms.
meanings.sent2: The early settlers colonizes the fertile valley, creating a thriving community.
meanings.sent3: The ants decided to colonizes the picnic area, much to the surprise of the visitors.
meanings.sent4: The idea of a new business colonizes his mind, driving him to take action.
meanings.sent5: The ivy slowly colonizes the garden, spreading its green leaves everywhere.

meanings.definition: Send settlers to (a place) and establish political control over it.
meanings.sent1: The empire colonizes distant lands, bringing their culture and laws.
meanings.sent2: The conquerors colonizes the conquered territories, imposing their rule.
meanings.sent3: The penguins jokingly plan to colonizes the warmer beaches for a vacation.
meanings.sent4: The idea of change colonizes the society, reshaping its structure.
meanings.sent5: The invasive species colonizes the ecosystem, disrupting the natural balance.
